name: Moshpit
description:
Me and my friend did this simulator at 2nd Alakajam and somehow we managed to win 3rd place in category originality.

---- Original post:

Your porpose is to get into as much concerts as possible, but you have limited time, so you can't see everything, sorry.
You are getting points for being close to stage, surfing above people and moshing. But all the people obstruct way and you need to get through them. Drink alcohol to get better stats, but at a cost…

We didn't have enough time to balance alcohol and physics. =(

We disabled AUDIO rating, because we broke the audio rules by putting songs in it.
